segments.text: Are you through with your meal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we are . Could we have the check , please ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here is your check , 86 dollars in all . Can I take care of it here when you are ready ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm sorry we don't . We accept credit cards and cash .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I don't have any cash with me , so I â€™ ll have to put it on credit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , please wait a minute . Can I have my food packaged ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I'll bring some to-go boxes for you .
segments.speaker: S1
